list.title: Redirect Hosts
list.emptyDescription: Create one to set up domain redirects.

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this redirect host?
messages.domainRequired: At least one domain name is required

help.domainNames: Enter the source domains to redirect. Enter one per line.
help.scheme: Select the protocol (HTTP/HTTPS) for the target URL. Auto selects automatically.
help.targetDomain: The target domain address to redirect to.
help.forwardPath: The path to forward to. Leave empty to use the original path.
help.preservePath: Preserve the path of the original URL when redirecting.
help.enableSsl: Apply an SSL certificate to this host.
help.forceHttps: Force all HTTP requests to redirect to HTTPS.
